text.label: Plugin Info
text.text: Send messages or get/set values with actors, scenes, and arbitrary Haxe objects. No options to configure.

text.label: Dialog Commands
text.text: setattr [ATTR value:Anything]<br>getattr [ATTR]<br>showattr [ATTR]<br>messagescene behaviorName:String message:String [argument:Anything ...]<br>messageactor actorName:String behaviorName:String message:String [argument:Anything ...]
